contents.contents: Walk along the “Rue du Palais” until you reach the Chatel Square. Turn right into the “Rue Saint Thibault”.
The name of a famous character keeps popping up everywhere in Provins.

question.contents: Which famous character brought back the “Rose of Provins” from the Crusades?

explanations.contents: The rose has an important place in Provins. Saint Thibault, count of Champagne, brought it back.
